title: Spotted: New SRAM Red AXS Ridden to Itzulia Women Victory by Demi Vollering
content:
A new groupset from SRAM can't be far away after seeing this complete Red branded group on multiple teams' bikes at the Itzulia Women.

Read the full article at Spotted: New SRAM Red AXS Ridden to Itzulia Women Victory by Demi Vollering on Velo.
author: Dave Everett
